location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Hewitson, Commander of the Cruizer Prince of Wales

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage; the opening body of the letter on f. 71 has been partially obscured and some of the content therefore is difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is instructing the Commander to proceed to Bombay. It also recommends that the Captain should search the baggage of two individuals bound for Muscat that were placed on board his vessel via the Resident at Bussora [Basra], in case they should have correspondence intended for powers hostile to Britain.
